pageContext.claim: “Because they refuse -- In fact, they just turned the cameras off. They refuse. [Audience boos] No. You see, you can't have a scandal if they don't report it. So the Times, and the Washington Post, and all of, you know, the Fake News, CNN, look! They turned the cameras off. I knew that was -- [Audience chants "CNN sucks"] No, it's a terrible thing. They turn their damn cameras off when they do that.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump sometimes falsely claims that he can see a camera light indicating that CNN is cutting away from his rally in real time.
